name: cov-subscription
description: Represents a Change of Value (COV) subscription for monitoring property changes in BACnet objects.

fields.name: recipient
fields.description: The recipient process that will receive COV notifications.

fields.name: monitored-property-reference
fields.description: Reference to the property being monitored for changes.

fields.name: issue-confirmed-notifications
fields.description: Indicates whether confirmed notifications should be issued to the recipient.

fields.name: time-remaining
fields.description: The remaining time in seconds before this subscription expires.

fields.name: cov-increment
fields.description: The minimum change in value required to trigger a notification. Optional.
